abstract: Azerbaijani military claims it acted in self-defense in killing of three Armenian civilians near its border, site of ongoing dispute over Nagorno-Karabakh region.
lead_paragraph: The Armenian police said Thursday that three civilians in villages near the border with Azerbaijan had been killed by Azerbaijani forces.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Armenia: Violence Erupts at Border

snippet: The Armenian police said Thursday that three civilians in villages near the border with Azerbaijan had been killed by Azerbaijani forces.
